text:
Yehoshua Matza (, 8 August 1931 – 30 December 2020) was an Israeli politician, economist and businessman. He was president and CEO of State of Israel Bonds. From 1984 to 2002, he was a member of the Likud. From 1996 to 1999, Matza was Minister of Health during the first Benjamin Netanyahu cabinet. Matza was born in Jerusalem.
Matza died on 30 December 2020 in Jerusalem at the age of 89.
